attributes.action: Cut NHS spending on Nicotine Replacement Therapy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Replacing Nicotine with nicotine does not always help to break the nicotine addiction. We believe even more smokers can be helped to stop smoking without costly long term "treatments". Large numbers have already stopped simply by reading one self help book, which could also be offered free by the NHS thereby cutting the costs for taxpayers.
